snippet: Sepp Blatter, FIFA’s president, has lodged an appeal of a 90-day suspension, his lawyers said, and has asked FIFA’s ethics committee to release the reasons for the suspension.
abstract: FIFA president Sepp Blatter appeals 90-day suspension and asks ethics committee to release reasons for imposing it; Michel Platini, president of European soccer federation, also plans to appeal his own suspension.
lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter, FIFA’s president, has lodged an appeal of a 90-day suspension, his lawyers said, and has asked FIFA’s ethics committee to release the reasons for the suspension.

headline.main: Blatter Files Appeal of His Suspension
headline.print_headline: Blatter Files Appeal of His Suspension
